Unlike many businesses we really like to hear from our customers. Whooooaaaah! We want to ensure you have a great time when dining with us and enjoying the many FUN things to do at Fudpuckers. If you have a question for us or would like to learn more about Fudpucker’s please email us at  fudpucker@fudpucker.com  or call the restaurant at 850-654-4200.  One of our incredibly knowledgeable staff members will do everything they can to assist you.  If they can’t, they will direct you to a manager or someone who can. You may also contact us by snail mail at the following address: Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill 20001 Emerald Coast Pkwy Destin, FL 32541 850-654-4200 Should you have a question for the main office please feel free to give us a call at (850) 654-1544. Reservations – Fudpucker's Beachside Bar & Grill Skip to main content 8506544200 fudpucker@fudpucker.com Home Menu Oral Delights Whistle Wetters Kid’s Menu Gators Shop Entertainment Events Jobs reservations Reservations Kids’ Birthday Parties Private Parties Catering Order Facebook page Facebook page Instagram page Instagram page Tik-tok page Tik-tok page Twitter page Twitter page Facebook page Facebook page Instagram page Instagram page Tik-tok page Tik-tok page Twitter page Twitter page Toggle navigation Home Menu Oral Delights Whistle Wetters Kid’s Menu Gators Shop Entertainment Events Jobs reservations Reservations Kids’ Birthday Parties Private Parties Catering Order Fudpucker’s Reservations, Large Groups, & Private Rooms Reservations – Fudpucker’s is not currently taking reservations. We highly recommend you Dine Early To Beat The Wait .  Seating is available on a first come first serve basis. Trust that we will seat you as quickly as we possibly can. IMPORTANT – unlike most other restaurants we have LOTS of FUN Things for you to do while you wait. Check out The Fudpucker Trading Company, Gator Beach, Live Entertainment on The BIG Deck, our Kid’s Playground and win a prize when you complete the Fudpucker Scavenger Hunt. LARGE Parties – Fudpucker’s accepts large parties who want to sit together and we will try our best to seat large groups in the same area. Please Note – ALL PARTIES of 7 or more will be assessed a 20% gratuity. Please Note – A Fud Fee of 2% will be charged to transactions. Private Party Rooms are available at Fudpucker’s Restaurant in Destin for groups of up to 150, subject to availability and staffing requirements. Rooms may be booked for special occasions or for large groups of 20 to 150 with advance notice, subject to availability and staffing requirements. Please Note – During the busy Spring, Summer and Fall Seasons a Room Fee, Service Fee and Coordination Fee will be charged to reserve your space. The Room Fee must be paid in advance and all Other Fees paid at the end of your event. Please feel free to contact us at 850-654-4200 to reserve your private room. Click for more information on Private Rooms . Wedding Parties, Receptions and other Catered Events are welcome with advance notice. We can accommodate up to 150 people in a private dining room at our restaurant in Destin. Our Event Coordinator will be happy to assist you with Special Menus if needed and other services to make your event everything you want it to be. Please Note – During the busy Spring, Summer and Fall Seasons a Room Fee, Service Fee and Coordination Fee will be charged to reserve your space. All Fees must be paid in advance. Please feel free to contact us at 850-654-4200 to reserve your private room. For a family FUN experience check out Fudpucker’s – they’ve been #1 for Food & Fun for 35 years.  Fudpucker’s opens at 11:00AM During the Spring, Summer and Fall seasons providing Lunch & Dinner late into the evening.  During the Winter we open at 11:30AM. Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
Why do we use it?
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like). Entertainment  – Fudpucker's Beachside Bar & Grill Skip to main content 8506544200 fudpucker@fudpucker.com Home Menu Oral Delights Whistle Wetters Kid’s Menu Gators Shop Entertainment Events Jobs reservations Reservations Kids’ Birthday Parties Private Parties Catering Order Facebook page Facebook page Instagram page Instagram page Tik-tok page Tik-tok page Twitter page Twitter page Facebook page Facebook page Instagram page Instagram page Tik-tok page Tik-tok page Twitter page Twitter page Toggle navigation Home Menu Oral Delights Whistle Wetters Kid’s Menu Gators Shop Entertainment Events Jobs reservations Reservations Kids’ Birthday Parties Private Parties Catering Order Entertainment Live Music At Fudpucker’s, we bring the fun with live entertainment five nights a week! Enjoy live musicians every evening from 6:20 PM to 9:30 PM, filling the air with great tunes. On Mondays and Wednesdays, grab the mic and show off your singing skills at our lively Karaoke nights. But that’s not all! During the summer, catch the Fudnominals dance team performing throughout the day, adding extra flair and excitement to your visit. Whether you’re here for the music, the dance, or just to have a blast, Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill is the place to be! Scavenger Hunt While you’re waiting for your table or in between Gator Shows, dive into the fun with Father Fud’s Photo Scavenger Hunt! This exciting activity is perfect for all ages and takes you on a thrilling journey all over Fudpucker’s. Use the treasure map to find various fun items and snap a photo of each one. Share your photos on social media (Facebook, Instagram, X, or TikTok), then show your posts to a Fudpucker Host to earn a spin on the Wheel of Fud! Prizes include treasures from our Treasure Chest, Gator Photos, a Fudpucker’s World Famous T-Shirt, and more. Discover the unique and fun-filled parts of Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill with this engaging adventure! Join the hunt, capture the memories, and win exciting prizes! Henna Tattoo Add a touch of art to your Fud adventure with our Henna Tattoo kiosk at Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill! Explore a wide variety of stunning designs and get some awesome henna body art. Whether you’re looking for something fun and simple or an intricate masterpiece, our talented artists have you covered. Perfect for all ages, this unique experience lets you take home a piece of the fun! Stop by and express yourself with a beautiful henna tattoo during your visit to Fudpucker’s! Balloon Animal Artist This summer, Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill is excited to host a talented Balloon Animal Artist! Perfect for kids of all ages (and fun-loving adults), our artist creates amazing and twisty balloon art that you can take with you on vacation. From classic balloon dogs and swords to whimsical balloon crowns, there’s no challenge too big! Make sure to tip our incredible artist for their fantastic work. Come and add a little extra fun to your visit with Fudpucker’s Balloon Animal Artist! Fun & Games While you wait for your table, the next Gator Show, or just enjoying some drinks and family fun, Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill has you covered with good old-fashioned games! Challenge your friends and family to Corn Hole, Hook and Ring games, Giant Jenga, and oversized Connect Four. Feeling nostalgic? Grab a Hula Hoop and channel your inner child! With plenty of fun and great food, Fudpucker’s is the perfect place to bring the family and make lasting memories. Live Alligators Gator Beach – The World’s Greatest Alligator Park, is located at Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill in Destin, Florida and is a must-see for Destin area visitors! Offering FREE ADMISSION for customers of the restaurant, it is open year-round. Live Gator Shows Feed the Gators Get a Photo with a Gator See our Rare Alligators Interactive Gator Beach Tours See our Baby Alligators & over 100 Alligators Destin Birthday Packages LET’S PARTY! Are you looking for a place to have your child’s next birthday party in Destin? Look no further than Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill’s Destin location! Our fun-filled party packages will give your child a birthday party experience that he or she will remember for years to come. Our Birthday Package provides all you need for a Fudtacular FUN Event at Fudpucker’s! Click Here to view our Destin Birthday Packages. The Gator Tours at Gator Beach offer the perfect mix of excitement, education, and hands-on fun for all ages. Whether you choose the Discovery Tour ’s guided exploration or the VIP Experience ’s behind-the-scenes thrills, you’ll get up close with real alligators in a safe, interactive setting. It’s more than just a tour… it’s a chance to laugh, learn, and bond over a wild Florida adventure your family will talk about long after the vacation ends. Book your Gator Tour toda y and make your beach trip truly legendary! Visit Gator Beach for more information. Burgers, Bourbon & Beer Festival Saturday September 20th Join us as we compete in the 5th Annual Burgers, Bourbon & Beer Festival returns to Destin, FL on Saturday, September 20, 2025! Get ready for an afternoon packed with gourmet burgers, local craft beers, and the finest bourbons—all in support of the Boys & Girls Clubs of the Emerald Coast. Every bite and sip helps build great futures for local youth! Location: 210 Harbor Blvd, Destin, FL, United States, Florida Tickets:  bit.ly/BBBFest2025 Destin Seafood Festival Saturday September 27th Sundays, Fridays and Saturdays every week Join us for the 47th Annual Destin Seafood Festival, spanning all along the Destin Harbor! Fudpucker’s will be competing in the VIP area and sponsoring the Kid’s Zone! Schedule: September 26th | 4pm-10pm September 27th | 10am-10pm September 28th | 10am-6pm’ The main festival is FREE TO ATTEND! Visit over 75 vendor booths, 5 music stages, Kids Zone, tons of local seafood vendors and more. Seafood and more available for purchase up and down the Destin Harbor. VIP Tickets will be required to enter our VIP area where attendees will sample a variety of food from local chefs. VIPs will also have access to private bathrooms, additional live music, private bar, and seating area. VIP Tickets on sale now: https://www.eventliveus.com/…/vip-tickets-destin… Visit www.destinseafoodfestival.com for more information! Pirate Brew Fest Saturday November 1st Pirate Brew Fest 2025  Ahoy, Mateys!  Set sail for Pirate Brew Fest at Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill on November 1, 2025, from 11 AM – 3 PM! This FREE event brings local breweries and distillers offering free samples and swag, plus axe throwing, pirate games, live island-rock tunes from Coconut Radio, and Fudpucker’s flame-grilled bites.   Browse handcrafted art, beer memorabilia, and soak up the salty, swashbuckling atmosphere.  Show off your pirate flair, our costume contest is looking for the fiercest buccaneers! Prizes await the best-dressed pirates!  Don your tricorns and eye patches; four hours of pirate fun await! Home Let's Eat Let's Eat 7 Things You May Not Know About Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill By Staff August 24, 2024 0 1300 Facebook Twitter Pinterest WhatsApp Where Fudpucker’s Started Fudpucker’s wasn’t always a Beachside Bar & Grill. It opened in 1982 as a snack bar inside NightTown – Destin’s first Nightclub where it was called Fudpucker’s Barside Galley. Thanks largely to great food and a successful T-Shirt, the following year Fud’s moved to a beachside shack in South Walton County where Pompano Joe’s is today. It is there that it became Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill. After a fire destroyed the building in 1985, Fud’s moved to Okaloosa Island next to Cash’s Faux Pas. In 1989, Fudpucker’s opened a second location on the new U.S. 98 in Destin. While Destin is now home to the only standalone Fudpucker’s, you can still enjoy our signature dishes at Pelican’s Roost at the Sundestin Beach Resort and at the Tiki Hut in Waterscape on Okaloosa Island. Beer Can Collection One of our founders, Tim Edwards, didn’t just contribute to the economy; he practically fueled it — one beer at a time. His college beer can collection has grown into a wall-spanning spectacle in several of Fudpucker’s dining rooms. This unique display is a tribute to Tim’s youthful zeal and love of beer. Every year, we host the Winter Brewery Collectible Show—a perfect blend of beer memorabilia and, well, more beer. Maze-Like Building Entering Fudpucker’s Beach-side Bar & Grill is like stepping into a whimsical labyrinth. No, seriously, good luck finding your way out! Our “7 Level Tree House” dining areas each boast unique themes (decorated with classic Fudpucker junk) and quirky names, creating a fun maze-like structure. You’ll encounter countless staircases, a vestibule with five different paths, an elevator, and even a few doors to nowhere. Don’t be surprised if families make a few laps before stumbling upon the exit. NWFL’s Only Alligator Park With over 200 alligators, free alligator shows and free admission, Gator Beach is undeniably “The World’s Greatest Alligator Park.” Explore our Reptile Discovery Zone, meet baby gators, join interactive guided tours, feed the gators, and get a photo holding one. Gator Beach is Destin’s ultimate adventure spot. For more info, slither over to www.GatorBeach.com . Honor Roll Program For over 35 years, Fudpucker’s has celebrated academic excellence with our Honor Roll program. We provide award certificates to elementary and middle school students who make the A or A/B Honor Roll, each redeemable for a free meal. Every year, we expand this program to more classrooms in Okaloosa and Walton Counties, supporting our local scholars one free meal at a time. Rob Whaack Scholarship In 2018, we partnered with Northwest Florida State College to create the Rob Whaack Culinary Scholarship, honoring our beloved kitchen manager. This scholarship covers 100% of the costs for the 12 credit hours needed for the Chef’s Apprentice Certificate, ensuring Rob’s legacy lives on. Fun While You Wait Anyone who’s dined out in Destin during summer knows that long waits are inevitable. But at Fudpucker’s, we turn waiting into a blast. With four bars to kick off your dining experience, NWFL’s only Alligator Park (with free admission), a photo scavenger hunt with prizes, a Fudnominal gift shop, a henna tattoo parlor, a hurricane simulator, bar games (like Ring & Hook and Cornhole), giant Jenga and Connect Four, and live entertainment, we’ve earned our title as “The Best Place To Wait”! Visit https://www.fudpucker.com . A Fudpuckin Update – Fudpucker's Beachside Bar & Grill Skip to main content 8506544200 fudpucker@fudpucker.com Home Menu Oral Delights Whistle Wetters Kid’s Menu Gators Shop Entertainment Events Jobs reservations Reservations Kids’ Birthday Parties Private Parties Catering Order Facebook page Facebook page Instagram page Instagram page Tik-tok page Tik-tok page Twitter page Twitter page Facebook page Facebook page Instagram page Instagram page Tik-tok page Tik-tok page Twitter page Twitter page Toggle navigation Home Menu Oral Delights Whistle Wetters Kid’s Menu Gators Shop Entertainment Events Jobs reservations Reservations Kids’ Birthday Parties Private Parties Catering Order A Fudpuckin Update by Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill | April 7, 2020 | Destin Area Information I sincerely hope you and your family are doing OK during this crazy time.  It is truly unprecedented in our lifetimes and all of us at Fudpucker’s send you our love. Things haven’t changed much here since my last update, but I wanted to share something with you so you get a feel for the impact this virus has had on local businesses in Destin – mine in particular. Back in 1982 when I opened Fudpucker’s as a Snack Bar in an 8’ by 10’ space at a local nightclub (Nightown) my sales the first night were $223.  Yesterday (38 years later) my sales in a 36,000 square foot building were $182.  In other words, the downturn in business has been catastrophic for us and our employees – just as it is for most small businesses across the country.  We have laid-off 96% of our employees and have fewer staff now than since 1985. Like many small businesses we are doing everything we possibly can to secure loans from the government and our bank to keep operating in an effort to keep our core staff employed. The FUDPUCKER TRADING COMPANY IS OPEN ONLINE AT www.fudpuckerstore.com if you are in the need of one of our World Famous T-Shirts. The bottom line is that we will make it through this – that is a promise.  We all will and may even come out of this mess with a more positive outlook.  I believe we are due for a re-set as to what is important and what is not.  I am encouraged when I see families working together in their yards and walking together in their neighborhoods.  My friends tell me that playing board games are a big deal and that their kids are actually enjoying their time with mom and dad. I miss seeing a full restaurant with people laughing and enjoying the food, alligator shows and family entertainment that we are famous for.  Most of all I miss you – the thousands of loyal customers that made it possible for me to make a good living and send my kids to college. Maybe what I am trying to do here is to say thanks for your support over the years and to let you know that you will be welcomed back with open arms next time you come by. Be safe and be good to your family and friends.  They are what matter most. Chester Kroeger aka Father Fud Founder and CEO of Fudpucker’s Beachside Bar & Grill
